mapper.select: SELECT RECIPE_NAME, HASHTAG, IMG_PATH, USER_ID, R.RECIPE_NO FROM T4_USER_RECIPE UR LEFT JOIN T4_RECIPE R ON R.RECIPE_NO = UR.RECIPE_NO LEFT JOIN T4_R_IMAGE I ON R.RECIPE_NO = I.RECIPE_NO WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND THUMBNAIL_YN ='Y'

SELECT A.FUNDING_NO, FUNDING_NAME, FUNDING_SUMMARY, FUNDING_END_DT, FUNDING_GOAL_CNT, CNT, TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, NOW(), FUNDING_END_DT) AS D_DAY, CONCAT(IMG_PATH, IMG_ORG_NAME) AS IMG_PATH, FORMAT(FUNDING_PRICE , 0) AS FUNDING_PRICE2, USER_ID
FROM T4_FUNDING A LEFT JOIN (SELECT FUNDING_NO, count(FUNDING_NO) as CNT FROM T4_FUNDING_MEMBER GROUP BY FUNDING_NO) B ON A.FUNDING_NO = B.FUNDING_NO LEFT JOIN (SELECT FUNDING_NO, IMG_PATH, IMG_ORG_NAME FROM mini_db2.T4_F_IMAGE WHERE THUMBNAIL_YN = 'Y' GROUP BY FUNDING_NO) C ON A.FUNDING_NO = C.FUNDING_NO LEFT JOIN T4_FUNDING_MEMBER M ON A.FUNDING_NO = M.FUNDING_NO WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND FUNDING_CLOSE_YN = 'N'

SELECT O.PRODUCT_NO, ORDER_DATE, ORDER_PRICE, FORMAT((ORDER_CNT*PRODUCT_PRICE) , 0) AS ORDER_PRICE2, USER_ID, ORDER_NO, ORDER_CNT, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_VOLUME, CONCAT(PRODUCT_WEIGHT, PRODUCT_VOLUME) AS WEIGHT, TITLE, CONTENT, IMG_PATH, NAME, FORMAT(PRODUCT_PRICE , 0) AS PRODUCT_PRICE2, format(((PRODUCT_PRICE*100/ PRODUCT_WEIGHT*PRODUCT_EA)), 0) AS PER_PRICE
FROM T4_ORDER O
LEFT JOIN T4_CODE C ON C.CODE = O.DELIVERY_STATUS AND C.KIND='DELIVERY' LEFT JOIN T4_PRODUCT P ON P.PRODUCT_NO = O.PRODUCT_NO LEFT JOIN T4_P_IMAGE I ON O.PRODUCT_NO = I.PRODUCT_NO
WHERE USER_ID = #{id} AND THUMBNAIL_YN='Y' GROUP BY ORDER_NO;
